course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Advanced Construction with AI and Robotics
course.description: This multi-faceted course encompasses advanced technologies in infrastructure and building construction, maintenance and operations. The course provides deep learning methods in computer vision and robot sensing with hands-on coding training on solving construction management problems with these methods. Combined with tools from AI and robotics, the course equips students with leading-edge knowledge and practices to bring about successful construction reform in the context of the smart city. The course is a mixture of lectures, tutorials, and student projects. The concept, theory and applications of AI and robotics in construction are delivered through lectures. The tutorials provide hands-on exercises on AI and robotics software development toolkits to learn how to apply these tools with given data. Through mini-projects, students explore the use of the toolkits for practical problem-solving in construction. Instructor’s approval is required.
course.prerequisites: COMP1021 OR COMP1022P OR COMP2011 OR COMP2012H

reviews.author: HKUST-1
reviews.title: 新course: 唔civil的civil course
reviews.comment_content:
新course
主要教你揼下machine learning code
教下你ml dl啲algorithm 又有好少好少數學咁 我阿嫲嚟聽都聽得明 (利申: 阿嫲有phd)

Course content
Week 2: Machine Learning in Smart Construction (Regression, RSS)
Week 3: Multi-Regression
Week 4+5: Assessing Performance: training error, generalization error
Week 6: Ridge Regression
Week 7: Lasso Regressuin
Week 8: NN - Kernal Regression (非NNN)
Week 9: Linear Classifier
Week 10: Classifiers
Week 11: Deep learning
Week 12: Robotics

有3個test, 3個in class assignment(跟住個TA揼曲就做完) 仲有1個mini-project

個mini-project係你要幾個topic度揀一個嚟講可以點樣應用喺construction industry度

Computer vision
natural language processing
speech recognition
digital twin
collaborative robots
exoskeleton
如果有其他有興嘅topic可以同professor傾

2次present2次report submission
第一次喺midterm period左右，要交intro + background only
第二次就乜都要交齊

啲in class test都係睇下你熟唔熟啲數點計，好簡單的，我阿爺都識計
reviews.comment_teaching:
很好人的professor
可以直接上佢office搵佢
你問啲唔關事嘅嘢只要佢識佢都會答

上佢office可以見到佢有部3090 電競主機，酸死我
reviews.comment_grading:
Course attendance 10% (10)
In-class assignment 15% (12)
In-class quiz 15% (12)
Mini project:
Midterm report 10% (9; 7.8)
midterm presentation 10% (9.67; 9.07)
final report 20% (19; 17)
final presentation 20% (19.5; 17.45)
分號後面係個mean
最後我A+
我個frd final present 低我一分A咗
我老竇嚟讀呢個course都拎到A-
reviews.comment_workload:
冇乜workload
早啲打文會冇咁痛苦
最大workload都係打文同睇文吧
始終civil底
淨係明CNN 同KNN都搞咗我成日
淨低都冇乜難度
記得睇多啲文睇吓啲人點做吧

不過2016年打後computer vision好多都係用deep learning approach
而course教嘅好多都係machine learning
所以如果你唔係做deep learning嘅話可能搵文上面會有少少難度
善用google scholar同sciencedirect吧
